metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000825 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
FreeCol version <= nightly-2018-08-22 contains a XML External Entity (XXE) vulnerability in FreeColXMLReader parser that can result in Disclosure of confidential data, denial of service, SSRF, port scanning. This attack appear to be exploitable via Freecol file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-1000825` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

freecol - 0.11.6+dfsg2-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freecol package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.11.6+dfsg2-3').
